# Placeholder - Download gradle-wrapper.jar
# 
# This file needs to be downloaded from Gradle's repository.
# Android Studio will automatically download it when you open the project.
#
# Or download manually from:
# https://github.com/gradle/gradle/raw/v8.5.0/gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar
#
# You can also run this in the android-app directory:
# curl -o gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nickyrabit/gradle-wrapper/main/gradle-wrapper-8.5.jar
